name: birling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sport in which two people try to stay standing on a floating log (= a thick piece of a tree trunk or branch), or other long, rounded object, while trying to make the other person fall off: Birling is a game played by lumberjacks. Synonym
logrolling
Matteo Omied/Alamy Stock Photo/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesLogrolling, also called birling, is a work-related lumberjack sport, like sawing and tree-climbing competitions. Various different sizes of logs are used in birling.He is a former world birling champion.
